member.name: T:Gallio.Reports.XmlReportFormatter
member.summary: Formats reports as Xml.

remarks.para:
Recognizes the following options:
Option Description
AttachmentContentDisposition Overrides the default attachment content disposition for the format. The content disposition may be "Absent" to exclude attachments, "Link" to include attachments by reference to external files, or "Inline" to include attachments as inline content within the formatted document. Different formats use different default content dispositions.
